channel.title: Posts on Academic
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Academic

item.title: AWS Certified - Machine Learning Speciality
item.description: I passed my AWS - Machine Learning Specialty Certificate exam today. Validation Number Z5C34M1B21B11C9V Validate at: http://aws.amazon.com/verification or at CredlyClaim Download Certificate

item.title: FTL Hackathon - COVID 19 and Global Impacts
item.description:
To make some worthwhile contribution of my data science skills in the present COVID-19 global pandemic crisis, I participated in this Female Tech Leaders (FTL) Hackathon. The theme of this hackathon was to look at “COVID19 and its Global Effects”. We had to select team members impromptu and come up with a project story.

Link to Certificate of Participation

item.title: Master Thesis Completion
item.description: I completed my master thesis ‘Machine Learning for an Aircraft’s Cabin Air Distribution System’ at Airbus Operations GmbH. The PDF of my Master Thesis Report can be accessed using this link GitHub Repository of Thesis Works: https://github.com/diliprk/MasterThesis-ML4ACADS

item.title: ADS-B Hackathon, Airbus Toulouse
item.description: I recently started my data science internship at Airbus Operations GmbH, Hamburg in September 2019 and was awarded the opportunity to participate in this ADS-B Hackathon at Airbus Leadership University, Toulouse, France.

item.title: Machine Learning for Natural Language Processing - Seminar on MaskGANs
item.description: I made a presentation on MaskGANs for the seminar Machine Learning for Natural Language Processing in Summer Semester 2018.

item.title: Data Analyst Nanodegree

item.title: Advances in Artificial Neural Networks - Seminar on GANs
item.description: I made a presentation on Generative Adversarial Networks for the seminar Advances in Artificial Neural Networks in Winter Semester 2017 - 2018.
